original_title: 新卒入社の西野さんは、モテない冴えない僕を悪女のように弄んで犯す。
overview: Akari joins this company, as a rookie employee and very pretty girl she has a halo of mystery and inaccessibility, that grabs everyone’s attention.  The protagonist manages to grab her attention and discovers her wild side.
title: Ms. Nishino, a new employee plays with me, a dull guy, like a bad woman
